page.title: 13Leisure contd.
page.content: For adults, depending on their age there are the service organisations of Lions,Rotary,Round Table and Red Cross.Womens Institutes, Co-op Guild. There are clubs specialising in Dancing,Photography,Wildfowling, Angling (sea and freshwater) ,Pantomime and Drama clubs for various denominational groups and for Old Age Pensioners. For those interested in sport and games there are clubs for Soccer,Rugby Football,Badminton, Tennis, Bowls and Cricket.In addition to all these there are the activities associated with the Licensed Trade i.e. Dominoes, Darts and Pool. All of the already mentioned activities cater for those resident in the district.
